query.sql: SELECT p.card_id FROM attribute_value p INNER JOIN attribute a on (a.attribute_code = p.attribute_code and a.data_type = 'C') JOIN attribute_value pt ON p.card_id=pt.card_id AND pt.attribute_code='JBR_INFD_TYPEDOC' join attribute_value inDate on inDate.card_id = p.number_value and inDate.attribute_code = 'JBR_INCOMEDATE' WHERE p.number_value IN ( SELECT c.card_id FROM card c JOIN attribute_value vp ON c.card_id=vp.card_id AND vp.attribute_code='JBR_SIGN_RESPONSIBLE' WHERE vp.number_value in (%CURRENTUSERS%) AND c.status_id=108 ) AND pt.number_value=900000805 order by inDate.date_value desc
